articles.author: Mark Thompson
articles.title: Adani scraps $2.5 billion share sale as value of his empire collapses - CNN
articles.description: Indian billionaire Gautam Adani on Wednesday abandoned a deal to raise $2.5 billion from investors after a week-long meltdown in the value of his logistics and energy business empire that started when an American short seller accused the conglomerate of fraud.

articles.title: Beyoncé announces 2023 Renaissance tour including 3 Canadian shows - CBC News
articles.description: Beyoncé is taking her Renaissance global. The superstar will start a world tour in Sweden this May with stops throughout Europe, Canada and the United States. Two nights in Toronto this July will kick off the North American leg of the tour.
articles.content:
Beyoncé is taking her Renaissance global.

articles.author: Diksha Madhok
articles.title: Asia's richest no more? Gautam Adani's wealth crashes as $90 billion wiped off his business - CNN
articles.description: Gautam Adani looks set to cede his position as Asia's richest man to another Indian billionaire as shares in his business empire continue to plunge following fraud allegations leveled by an American short seller.
